overview: Robert Gerberg is one of America’s most trusted names in professional job hunting. He is the author of dozens of books and multimedia presentations that have helped millions of people worldwide. His published works include The Professional Job Hunter’s Guide, The Professional Job Changing System, and An Easier Way to Change Jobs, among others. His son, Robert Gerberg Jr. is the CEO of Advanced Career Technologies.

milestones.description: President of AJN and is author of several best selling books on job hunting.
